item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (253 points | 81 comments)
2. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (223 points | 20 comments)
3. Were RNNs all we needed? (342 points | 151 comments)
4. The Unraveling of Space-Time (57 points | 38 comments)
5. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (733 points | 523 comments)
6. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (966 points | 300 comments)
7. The Silk Road (2023) (12 points | 1 comment)
8. I got everything off the cloud: I'm now paying 10x LESS money (23 points | 14 comments)
9. Correcting the record for Continue and PearAI (80 points | 54 comments)
10. IRS Direct File adds 12 additional states, covers more tax situations in 2025 (75 points | 16 comments)
11. Go Concurrency vs. RxJS (27 points | 26 comments)
12. The Heart of Unix (2018) (110 points | 55 comments)
13. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (137 points | 59 comments)
14. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (26 points | 5 comments)
15. DOSBox-X: Enhanced Fork of DOSBox for Expanded DOS and Retro PC Support (83 points | 28 comments)
16. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (122 points | 33 comments)
17. Personal Names Around the World (2011) (33 points | 13 comments)
18. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (165 points | 189 comments)
19. What OS should I drive? (7 points | 7 comments)
20. Why does Lisp use cons cells? (1998) (25 points | 14 comments)
21. Interviewing for Evidence (15 points | 5 comments)
22. Skymont: Intel’s E-Cores reach for the Sky (38 points | 5 comments)
23. Show HN: Zero – DX focused non framework to interact with the DOM (24 points | 4 comments)
24. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
25. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (197 points | 130 comments)
26. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (39 points | 7 comments)
27. SiteOne Crawler – big tool with no users (26 points | 8 comments)
28. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (257 points | 137 comments)
29. Sequencing wastewater may be key to getting a grip on the H5N1 bird flu outbreak (26 points | 8 comments)
30. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (41 points | 10 comments)
